import { Icon } from '@iconify/react'; import React from 'react'; import parser from 'html-react-parser'; import { Link as ScrollLink } from 'react-scroll'; export default function About({ data }) { // Tambahkan 'skills' di destructuring const { imgSrc, miniTitle, title, description, skills, btnText, btnUrl } = data; return (
{/* Efek animasi */}
{/* Konten utama */}
{miniTitle && (
{miniTitle}
)} {title &&

{parser(title)}

}

{description}

{/* === Skill Bars === */}
{skills?.map((skill, index) => (
{skill.title}
{skill.percentage}%
))}
{/* Tombol */}
{btnText}{' '}
); }
